pulled-pork-sandwich.title: Pulled Pork Sandwich
pulled-pork-sandwich.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
pulled-pork-sandwich.description: Tender pulled pork slow-smoked to perfection, served on a brioche bun with shoestring fries.
pulled-pork-sandwich.longDescription: Experience our mouthwatering Pulled Pork, slow-cooked to perfection and brimming with flavor. Served with our signature shoestring fries and your choice of sauce.

sauces.name: Original BBQ
sauces.description: Our Original House BBQ Sauce is a timeless classic, offering a rich and savory flavor with just the right touch of tang.

sauces.name: Sweet & Spicy
sauces.description: Our Sweet & Spicy House BBQ Sauce offers the perfect balance of rich sweetness and a fiery kick.

sauces.name: Peach Bourbon
sauces.description: Our Peach Bourbon BBQ Sauce offers a unique blend of sweet, juicy peaches and the warm, smoky notes of bourbon.

sauces.name: Carolina Gold
sauces.description: Our Carolina Gold Sauce is a tangy and zesty twist on a Southern classic with a distinctive mustard bite.

sides.name: Mac & Cheese
sides.description: Indulge in creamy macaroni infused with smoky flavors, a comforting classic that's irresistibly cheesy.

sides.name: Baked Beans
sides.description: Sink your teeth into our BBQ Baked Beans, slow-cooked to perfection with a tangy sauce and savory chunks of bacon.

sides.name: Collard Greens
sides.description: Experience the bold flavors of our Collard Greens, simmered to perfection with onions, garlic, and a hint of smoky goodness.

sides.name: Cole Slaw
sides.description: Savor the crisp freshness of our Coleslaw, a perfect balance of crunchy cabbage and creamy dressing.

chopped-brisket-sandwich.title: Chopped Brisket Sandwich
chopped-brisket-sandwich.name: Chopped Brisket Sandwich
chopped-brisket-sandwich.description: 12-hour smoked Angus brisket chopped and served on Texas toast with shoestring fries.
chopped-brisket-sandwich.longDescription: Our signature 12-hour smoked Angus brisket with perfect bark and juicy inside, chopped and piled high on Texas toast.

slider-trio.title: Slider Trio
slider-trio.name: Slider Trio
slider-trio.description: Three sliders: Pulled Pork, Chopped Brisket, and Pulled Chicken served with shoestring fries.
slider-trio.longDescription: Can't decide? Try all three! Our popular trio featuring mini versions of our signature sandwiches.

sweet-potato-pie.title: Sweet Potato Pie
sweet-potato-pie.name: Sweet Potato Pie
sweet-potato-pie.description: Indulge in a slice of our Sweet Potato Pie, a heavenly blend of velvety sweet potatoes, warm spices, and a flaky crust.
sweet-potato-pie.longDescription: Each slice offers a taste of Southern tradition and homemade goodness, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

banana-pudding.title: Banana Pudding
banana-pudding.name: Banana Pudding
banana-pudding.description: Dive into a spoonful of our Banana Pudding, a heavenly blend of creamy custard, ripe bananas, and luscious vanilla wafers.
banana-pudding.longDescription: Each serving is a taste of Southern comfort, guaranteed to transport you to dessert bliss with every bite.

sweet-tea.title: Sweet Tea
sweet-tea.name: Sweet Tea
sweet-tea.description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing Sweet Tea, brewed to perfection and kissed with just the right amount of sweetness.
sweet-tea.longDescription: Quench your thirst with our refreshing Sweet Tea, brewed to perfection and kissed with just the right amount of sweetness.
